DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer ( absence disease : psychiatric , physical , neurological , metabolic , ... ) Psychiatric disorder Hepatic disease Renal disease Gastrointestinal disease Hematological disease Smokers Physical and/or neurological disease Positive urine drug screen Abnormal blood pressure Abnormal urine/blood analysis ( sodium , potassium , chloride , creatinine , urea , ALT , AST , total protein , glucose , TSH )
